resources.string: In this fragment is is shown how to give views weight, so that the views automaticly split the remaining free space in the fragment and split it in 1:3 ratio
This fragment is for the 2nd class of the semester. It shows a progress bar, a simple text retrieval on button click and switches
This should be replaced with the text from the EditText once the button is pressed
Write your text here that will replace TextView
When the switch is active, the fragment background is light blue otherwise its pink
Send a message to another activity
This app is to show what I, Justinas Jancys, have learned during this semester in the android course.
They said that its impossible to make an app in just 3 days. I say its very possible, it just looks terrible.
Sorry in advance for the ugly design. Im not an artist.
